mailSubject: Confirmation of Checklist Update for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC
mailBody:
Dear Surbhi,

I hope this message finds you well.

I would like to confirm that the checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC has been successfully updated based on the internal data you provided. The checklist now includes the latest information, including the previously missing PEP screening details that have been extracted from the attachment.

Please find the updated checklist securely stored in our system for your reference. If you have any further questions or require additional information, please feel free to reach out.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,
Shubham Sahay
shubham.sahay@capgemini.com
